articles.title: A businessman in his 50s received a text message from an acquaintance of the businessman in early Fe..
articles.author: Kim Song-Hyun
articles.summary: Smishing (SMSMSG phishing) is a modern form of payment text fraud. Smishing usually begins with a text message impersonating a public institution or text message from an acquaintance. The text is accompanied by an Internet address (URL) that induces the installation of malicious applications (apps). If the app is installed, the victim's control of his or her smartphone is transferred to a phishing organization. Criminals take a peek at a victim's daily life with a smartphone microphone and camera. If a smartphone camera captures the victim naked, they try to threaten and ask for money under the pretext of the photo.

articles.summary: Donald Trump is preparing to sign an executive order aimed at curbing discrimination against the crypto industry by US banks, according to the Wall Street Journal. The order would introduce fines for banks that block transactions involving crypto-industry transactions, sources familiar with the matter say.

articles.title: Trump to Sign Order Protecting Crypto from Political Debanking—Here's What It Means
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Donald Trump is preparing to sign an executive order that would shield crypto firms and individuals from politically motivated debanking by financial institutions. The order pushes regulators to investigate potential legal violations by banks, including those related to anti-discrimination and consumer protection laws, and it would shield them from such activities.

articles.title: Brazil to hold a public hearing on August 20 to discuss creating a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve
articles.author: Cryptopolitan
articles.summary: The first official debate on whether a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve should be established will be held on August 20, 2025 in the Chamber of Deputies in Brasilia's capital. It will address Bill 4.501/2024, which suggests the addition of Bitcoin to the national reserve.

articles.title: Indonesian officials eye Bitcoin mining for national reserves after key meeting

articles.summary: Indonesia has opened discussions on integrating Bitcoin into its national reserves following a high-level meeting between the Vice President's office and Bitcoin Indonesia, Asia's largest BTC community. The meeting marked a pivotal moment in Indonesia's evolving approach to digital assets as officials explored integration.

articles.title: Bitcoin's Long-Term Bullishness Evaporates From Options Market as Inflation Concern Rises
articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: The Bitcoin bull is reconsidering its long-term bullish conviction. The 180-day skew, measuring the difference in implied volatility between Deribit-listed out-of-the-money call and put options, has recently retreated to zero. Bitcoin's bullish sentiment for the far-month options has vanished and it is now firmly neutral.

articles.title: UAE & Google to Launch Cyber Security Centre of Excellence
articles.summary: The United Arab Emirates has announced the establishment of a Cyber Security Centre of Excellence in collaboration with Google. The centre is expected to generate more than 20,000 jobs and attract USD 1.4 billion in foreign direct investment by 2030. It also aims to reduce cybercrime-related losses by an estimated USD 6.8 billion over the same period.
